sentences.sCn: 天文学的前身是占星术。

sentences.sContent: This should be contrasted with nonscientific programs and the best example of a nonscientific program is astrology.
sentences.sContent_eng: This should be contrasted with nonscientific programs and the best example of a nonscientific program is astrology.
sentences.sCn: 这点与非科学假说正好相反,非科学假说最好的例子便是占星术了。

sentences.sContent: It was a great innovator in medicine, astronomy, astrology, mathematics and banking; the Babylonians may even have believed that the world was round.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was a great innovator in medicine, astronomy, astrology, mathematics and banking; the Babylonians may even have believed that the world was round.
sentences.sCn: 它在医药，天文学，占星术，数学和银行业方面都堪称一个伟大的改革者。 甚至，古巴比伦人可能已经相信地球是圆的。

words.tran: 占星的；占星学的，占星术的

trans.tranCn: 占星术, 占星学(以观测天象来预卜人间事务的一种方术)
trans.tranOther: the study of the positions and movements of the stars and how they might influence people and events
